title: Koala

nouns: A tree-dwelling marsupial that resembles a small bear with a broad head, large ears and sharp claws, mainly found in eastern Australia.
A thickset arboreal marsupial herbivore native to Australia.
Sluggish tailless Australian arboreal marsupial with grey furry ears and coat; feeds on eucalyptus leaves and bark
A tree-dwelling marsupial that resembles a small bear.
A koala.
Marsupial
The koala is an arboreal herbivorous marsupial native to Australia.
A young rat.
A young dog.
A puppy; a young dog.
A puppy is a juvenile dog.
A young dog
Juvenile dog
A large beast of prey of the family Ursidae, related to the dog and raccoon, having shaggy hair, a very small tail, and flat feet.
Large mammal of family Ursidae.
Massive plantigrade carnivorous or omnivorous mammals with long shaggy coats and strong claws
Any mammal of the family Ursidae; the bears
In Latin ursus
Family of mammals
A large omnivorous mammal, related to the dog and raccoon, having shaggy hair, a very small tail, and flat feet; a member of family Ursidae, particularly of subfamily .
Bears are mammals of the family Ursidae.

description:
A friendly, cartoon-styled face of a koala—a bear-like marsupial known for eating eucalyptus and sleeping—looking straight ahead. Depicted as a gray face with round, fluffy ears and a large, black nose.

Often used with an affectionate tone and in association with Australia, where the animal is found.

Available as an Apple Animoji.

Google previously depicted a full-bodied koala climbing a tree, Softbank’s koala previously had brown fur.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the koala emoji is a charming and cuddly depiction, rendered with soft, rounded edges and a fuzzy texture that invites a sense of warmth. Its large, dark eyes and gentle expression, enhanced by Apple's realistic lighting, give it a sweet and serene appearance. This endearing marsupial, with its characteristic gray fur and large ears, is often used to represent Australia, nature, or to convey feelings of cuteness, gentleness, and a relaxed demeanor on Apple devices.
